mapper.select: SELECT o_no, o_id, o_address, SUM(o_num) sum_o_num, FORMAT(SUM(CAST(REPLACE(o_total, ',', '') AS UNSIGNED)), 0) AS sum_o_total, o_date, o_permit FROM public_schema.OrderList GROUP BY o_no;
SELECT po.o_no, po.p_no, sp.p_name, po.o_num, po.o_total FROM public_schema.OrderList AS po INNER JOIN Supplier.productCode sp ON po.p_no = sp.p_no where po.o_no = #{o_no};
